definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: roof, top (NH id.; Di camp. Eth. g4g:g4g4: vinculum (ferreum), jugo simil. collare ferreum; √ dub.; Thes prop. [[גגג]]; perh. [[גנג]] (= [[גנגן]]) cover Bö:§ 292 Sta:§ 189 a MV)—[[גׇּג]] Jos 2:6 + 9 t. + 1Sa 9:26 Kt (Qr [[גׇּ֫גׇה]]), [[גׇּ֫גׇה]] Jos 2:6, 1Sa 9:26 Qr (Kt [[גנ]]); cstr. Ju Jdg 9:51 + 2 t. + Ez Eze 40:13 (del. Co v. infr.); sf. [[גַּגֶּךָָ]] De 22:8, [[גַּגּוֹ]] Ex 30:3 + 2 t. + Ez Eze 40:13 (del. Co v. infr.); pl. [[גַּגּוֹת]] Is 37:27 + 5 t.; sf. [[גַּגּוֹתֶיהָ]] Is 15:3, [[גַּגּוֹתֵיהֶם]] Je 32:29, [[גַּגּׁתֵיהֶם]] Je 19:13; —

roof (of house) De 22:8, Jos 2:6, Jos 2:6, Jos 2:8, Jos 16:27, 1Sa 9:25, 1Sa 9:26, 2Sa 11:2, 2Sa 11:2, 2Sa 16:22, 2Ki 19:26 = Is 37:27, Ne 8:16, Ps 102:8, Ps 129:6, Pr 21:9, Pr 25:24, Is 15:3, Is 22:1, Je 48:38; as places of idolatrous worship (esp. of heavenly bodies) Je 19:13, Je 32:29, Zep 1:5; so [[הַגׇּג עֲלִיַּת אָחָז]] 2Ki 23:12, roof of tower Ju Jdg 9:51, Ju Jdg 9:51, over gate 2Sa 18:24, of chamber Ez Eze 40:13, Eze 40:13 (but LXX Co [[קיר]]).
top of altar of incense, in tabern. Ex 30:3, Ex 37:26 (both p).
